subject: Pro Plus Pedals - lubrication
description_text:
Hi Simsonn team

I firstly want to say how impressed I am coming up to 1 year in December,
of ownership of these amazing pedals. They are the best I have had, having
previously owned Thrustmaster and Fanatec CSPs. Now with haptic feedback to
add as an option, you are doing a wonderful job for your customer base...
thank you!!

So I am getting squeaky noises on the throttle return and both ways on the
brake. Both are fitted with dampers and wondered what lubricant you suggest
and where this should be applied please?

May I also ask, when can we expect to hear about the direct drive
wheelbase? Are there multiple Nm options or just one?

Kind regards

David

conversations.body_text: Hi David Bristow,    1. The instruction manual specifies the recommended lubricant and application areas;  2. The direct drive wheelbase will be launched this November, offering three distinct torque settings (12, 18, 27Nm).

Many thanks for the information and the update on the base. Looking forward
to detailed specs and pricing!!

Kind regards

David

On Tue, 23 Sept 2025 at 11:32, support@simsonn.com
Hi David Bristow,    There is currently no reference pricing available.
